message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value, potentially even exceeding $1500000. While I can't disclose the exact details without a confidentiality agreement, I'm confident this product has the potential to be a game-changer for you. I'm offering it to you at a price of $1800000. This represents a significant opportunity for you to acquire something truly exceptional. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
